name: Cultist Meditation
body:
### Welcome to Cultist Meditation. Venture down into the [dungeon] to fulfill the [ritual] of your dreams with [guidance] of the meditating cultists (twitch crowd)! ### Global Game Jam 2016 (Finnish GJ, Oulu) Crafted in Unity in one hectic 48h marathon! Based on [diversifiers](http://globalgamejam.org/news/ggj16-diversifiers-are): * Twitch Plays (& Crowd sourced) * Comic book colours * One hand tied behind my back ### Authors and Contributors (Code) @Zaelot @domestus @stcl
(Music) Pasi 'Smil' Tervonen & Aki Sirni√∂ ### Inspiration from the idea by @ikaikkon
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
